# Progress.FileOperationKind

**Structure**

The kind of file operation.

## Declaration

```swift
struct FileOperationKind
```

## Discussion

When tracking file operations with the progress [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/kind] set to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProgressKind/file], provide a value for the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProgressUserInfoKey/fileOperationKindKey] in the user info dictionary.

To specify the kind of file operation, provide one of the following values:

- [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/FileOperationKind-swift.struct/copying]
- [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/FileOperationKind-swift.struct/decompressingAfterDownloading]
- [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/FileOperationKind-swift.struct/downloading]
- [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/FileOperationKind-swift.struct/uploading]
- [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/FileOperationKind-swift.struct/receiving]

## Creating Kinds of File Operation

- **init(_:)**: Creates a new kind of file operation using the specified string.
- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a new kind of file operation using the raw value of a string you specify.

## Recognizing Kinds of File Operations

- **copying**: The progress is tracking the copying of a file from source to destination.
- **decompressingAfterDownloading**: The progress is tracking file decompression after a download.
- **downloading**: The progress is tracking a file download operation.
- **uploading**: The progress is tracking a file upload operation.
- **receiving**: The progress is tracking the receipt of a file from another source.

## Inspecting File Operation Progress Information

- **fileOperationKind**: The kind of file operation for the progress object.
- **fileURL**: A URL that represents the file for the current progress object.
- **fileTotalCount**: The total number of files for a file progress object.
- **fileCompletedCount**: The number of completed files for a file progress object.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
